website_summaries.verdict: Provides a long-lasting hold and gives hair a moldable matte texture. Suitable for both men and women.
pros: Works well for adding definition and texture to edges and ends
cons: Some users find it a little too sticky compared to other more clay based options on the market

customer_reviews.title: It's dry
customer_reviews.text: This stuff will really hold but it's "dry." I have about 5" of hair in the front and top and alternate between Paul Mitchell's Tea Tree shaping cream and Aveda's grooming clay, both of which I like for their matte, medium-strong hold and the work-ability. I gave this a try and it sure is matte and strong, but it's also strong enough where my fingers can no longer comb through my hair after the product's mixed in. I'm keeping it for when I travel to some place more humid, where a stronger hold is required to combat the humidity droop, but I'll stick to my other hair products for the day-to-day.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Crazy thickening
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I've used Mitch styling clay. Maybe I'll get better at using it over time. First and second uses were interesting. A nickel size dab was way more than enough for a full head of thick hair. I applied it to my damp hair and let it air dry. I haven't had hair that thick since I was in and out of the ocean every day and ran out of conditioner. Not saying it's not a good product, just saying the thickening capabilities far exceed that of any other "clay" grooming product I have used.
customer_reviews.author: e krause

customer_reviews.title: Works as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Definitely works as advertised. Gives hold, lift and noticable volume with zero shine. It's somewhat water soluble. If your hair is too damp, it won't take, bit even after 2 shampoos, you can still feel it on your hair. All in all a decent product, though. It's way more spreadable than other clay products, but beware, it dries quickly, and holds that way, so you need to style quickly. You won't have a lot of time to fiddle with it
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J Sandifer

customer_reviews.title: Works great and you don't need very much
customer_reviews.text: Works great and you don't need very much. Have had it now for a LONG time and it's still not even 1/3rd of the way gone. If you use too much, it's gets cakey and flakey but if you just use a bit and really rub it in and then apply another small bit then it really works...it's a build up product.
customer_reviews.author: K. Moore

customer_reviews.title: what guy wants smelly hair?
customer_reviews.text: I've managed to stick with this product through various formulas over the years, but the new one is not going to work for me. Man, the hold is like cement forget about you or someone else running their fingers through it - that's gonna be awkward! Worst of all is the smell - it's just terrible. I'm done with this product - sorry to say it too because it's worked relatively well for several years!
customer_reviews.author: chris smith

customer_reviews.title: Great for thick hair!!
customer_reviews.text: At 44 I’ve used it all - this stuff is the best. I have thick Latinx hair so I need something to hold my hairstyle in place WITHOUT it looking wet or greasy. It’s price range in stores vary and Buying from Amazon saves me the hassle of trying to find it. Pro tip: blow drying your hair first and then applying gives it a matte finish and not wet look.
customer_reviews.author: Squito

customer_reviews.title: If you use Reformer DO NOT BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: This product has a decent hold and smell. HOWEVER, it is GARBAGE compared to Reformer. Once you run your fingers through your hair the first time, there is no second time. the hold is almost immediate. I wet my hands to make it so I can rerun my fingers through my hair. After it dried, it felt like gel but with a Matte finish. Part of the reason i do not use gel is because of the hardening. If you use the Reformer, MAKE SURE YOU BUY THE REFORMER AND NOT THIS TRASH.
customer_reviews.author: consumer

customer_reviews.title: Strong Hold
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Paul Mitchell hair product for me. I've graduated from the clean cut to the reformer to this one. This has the strongest hold by far, and it keeps my hair in place better than anything else I've tried. It's not too shiny and is very easy to apply. This is going to be my go-to from here on out.
customer_reviews.author: Conway Stern

customer_reviews.title: It's feels more like pulling my hair
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's me, but unless my hair is wet, working this in my hair is not a pleasant experience. It's feels more like pulling my hair. Even if I dilute it with some water, if my hair is dried, same problem. Update: 4/21/17 I found that mixing it with hair syrum made the application of the product way better when I had longer hair. But now that my hair is short (maybe an inch at best) I don't even need to add strum to apply it
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: A+! Best firm hold, Easy to wash out
customer_reviews.text: This is the only product I use! I have used many different products for years and years but this is the absolute best stuff. Washes out clean and easy, it’s hold is amazing! Doesn’t look wet or Gel like had a firm dry look and can shape with extreme hold! A+!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Strong hold.
customer_reviews.text: Strong hold! Matte finish! Apply to wet hair for a harder feeling finish. Appmy to freshly dried hair for a strong hold with soft to the touch feeling
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Styling clay that definitely has a strong hold.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this styling clay for years. I do wish it was a bit cheaper... but it lasts about a month for me (apply everyday before work). I would suggest pairing this with some kind of hair volume product if you have thin strait hair like myself. When it comes to styling clay, it’s mostly preference. I have stuck (no pun intended :)) with this brand because they give me what I ask: Strong hold Good smell Quality feeling product.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Abegg

customer_reviews.title: Strong matte hold with a nice fragrance.
customer_reviews.text: Strong matte hold as expected. I have been using this product for a while and they recently changed its odor to something stronger, close to a men'a perfume or deodorant fragrance. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Hugo

customer_reviews.title: Like wearing a helmet
customer_reviews.text: This is too thick and impossible to wash out. I am very disappointed in my purchase. If you have moderately thick hair, your hair will dry and feel like a helmet that you can't touch. Then, when you go to wash your hair, you may as well use acetone because the wax just doesn't come out. Worst product I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Columbus Bolger

customer_reviews.title: Best product I've found. Works perfectly for shorter styles.
customer_reviews.text: Matterial is the best product I've ever used. My hair is short and a little choppy, and this product gives it great texture and shape. I love that it provides a really strong hold, but isn't shiny. This makes for a much softer, more natural look. I use a finishing spray to set my hair after it's styled.
customer_reviews.author: David T.

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: It’s good. You just gotta get used to how strong it is and how quickly it sticks and dries on the hair. Gotta practice a lot with it to find how it works for you
customer_reviews.author: Holy nun

customer_reviews.title: Daily routine
customer_reviews.text: This is now a staple to my daily routine, I’ve tried many other hair products, but nothing holds my coarse hair like this does. I love the matte look as well.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony D.

customer_reviews.title: Has great hold with with no shine
customer_reviews.text: I have medium thick 3 inch hair and use Bluuman original as a prestyler. PROS: Has great hold with with no shine. Hair stays put all through the day. CONS: Your hair does stick to itself a bit to the point where you can't run your hands through it without pulling some hair out. TIPS: Don't rub it in your hands too much it thickens up quickly. As soon as it gets in your hair it toughens up. You do need to wash it with shampoo at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: collin

customer_reviews.title: Add volume, anti humidity, strong hold and no grease
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a lot of products and I always used boogies hair until it got discontinued and I been in search for a product that really keeps your hair in place from the wind, sweat, and add volume/thickness and this product is the best one I have ever bought even better than all the previous hair products like Sebastian craft clay, best hair product period. Also doesn’t leave your hair feeling greasy at all, just the perfect hair product.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: 15 year olds favorite hair product
customer_reviews.text: I would give this a 5, but feel it’s overpriced for the amount you receive. This is the only product my 15 year son feels holds his hair in place throughout the day. So I try to purchase it on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Noel

customer_reviews.title: Holds a handlebar mustache!
customer_reviews.text: I sue this as the first of two steps to curl my handle bar mustache. It is soooo easy to tame the beast and take the basic shape ahead of Can You Handlebar Secondary wax which is step two.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: I like it however
customer_reviews.text: I like it however, the picture does not match the description of the actual product I used at the salon. So it is misleading, and a different product. However it still works well, it's just that it is a little more rough than the one that I thought I was purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Y

customer_reviews.title: Good hair product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my cousin and he loves it. For him, minimal spread was needed. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: AMZN Customer (verified purchaser)

customer_reviews.title: Best product I have found for my thick short hair.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several products for my very thick short hair. This one is hands down the best. It helps control the hair better than any other I have tried, isn't sticky when I run hand fingers through it and it smells nice.
customer_reviews.author: ricohamby

customer_reviews.title: Strong Natural Look
customer_reviews.text: This is the best hair product I have used. It has a strong hold for all-day use and even when I wear hats. On top of that, it does not shine and it looks natural. Love this hair clay.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Good hold, no shine at all
customer_reviews.text: Used this product for years and getting harder to find on the shelves. I purchased this hoping I would receive the correct item, not Reformer which is almost identical in packaging. Luckily I got what I ordered and I'm happy. If you want true matte finish and a strong hold without a crisp feel like hairspray and glue, then try this.
customer_reviews.author: matthew yale

customer_reviews.title: This has a better hold than the Rock On and smells better too
customer_reviews.text: I've always used Rock On from Sally's which is similar to this product. This has a better hold than the Rock On and smells better too. The only problem is that it's twice the cost. I went back to the cheaper product and use hairspray with it, but my hair doesn't smell as good as it did with this.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Great hair product for those of us who do not like to fuss!!!!
customer_reviews.text: you can use this product on a light basis , or heavy to make your hair fit your mood.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Has a nice man scent and holds my hair pretty well without ...
customer_reviews.text: Has a nice man scent and holds my hair pretty well without much next day flakes . Would like to have a bit more hold , but it's comparable to far more expensive molds.
customer_reviews.author: A. Man

customer_reviews.title: Smells good
customer_reviews.text: has a good light scent. wish it spread a little easier and washed out easier but the hold and look (matte) is great.
customer_reviews.author: Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Works great and I don’t break out! There is no shine, but be sure not to use to much or it will turn white!
customer_reviews.author: Demi Sutra

customer_reviews.title: As advertised...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely strong hold and ultra matte finish...moreso than the Reformer product. My only reason to minus one star is that it's vanilla white in color and does not emulsify well when rubbing between hands....so it tends to go on a little white when applied unless your're using a super small amount which may not be enough.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: All in all, it's ok
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and the product is exactly as described. The hold is not strong or at least not as strong as I need.
customer_reviews.author: Maxpower

customer_reviews.title: Good hold and doesn't have a strong smell
customer_reviews.text: Been using this clay for awhile and it gives you pretty good control while not having a strong scent.
customer_reviews.author: pcguy63

customer_reviews.title: Must be good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only stuff my college age son wants to use on his hair. He is even willing to pay the extra (out of his own pocket) to get this product, instead of the less expensive options by the same manufacturer that are available locally. Must be good stuff! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Mom by Love

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have thin hair and it’s exactly what I needed for holding in place without looking wet/oily
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Check carefully as mine was different from the description
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this a little while ago in anticipation of running out. I just went to open it and noticed that even though the store’s stick on label on the back says it’s the “Matterial”, the container says it’s “Reformer”. Of course I am past my return window so there is nothing I can do.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: This has a great hold without making the hair greasy or heavy
customer_reviews.text: This has a great hold without making the hair greasy or heavy. It also adds thickness to the hair, which makes it look fuller. The best hair product I've had and I'm getting rid of my gels and mousses.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie Z

customer_reviews.title: I love the product, but consistency is difficult
customer_reviews.text: You have to rub it in between your hands almost instantly. If you remove the tin foil cover, it will ruin the product. works really well..I just wish it was easier to apply
customer_reviews.author: PrivacyMatters

customer_reviews.title: Good Product too expensive
customer_reviews.text: Works well but no reason for it to cost $18
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Support your hair!
customer_reviews.text: Great for providing my hair the opportunity for more height at their roots around my facial hairline.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Jobe

customer_reviews.title: Strong hold
customer_reviews.text: Gave the stronger hold needed when my hair got too long for the reformer paste
customer_reviews.author: B. Meyers

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The product is okay but the smell is so strong it is hard to use.
customer_reviews.author: Marolynn Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Great for men, Paul Mitchell products do what they say what they are going to do!
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up for my son who has wave longer (above the collar) hair. The ladies at the cutting place he goes to sold him some before, and whe it ran out (3 months) I went looking. Amazon bear the salon price by A LOT!
customer_reviews.author: SexySadie

customer_reviews.title: The best hair product you can buy.
customer_reviews.text: The best molding clay I have ever used. No shine, good hold, doesn't make hair clumpy. Once you put it in not only does it look good, but it feels good and keeps it's form the whole day.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Best men's hair product in the market!
customer_reviews.text: Super quick shipping, great price, and one of the best mens hair products in the market!
customer_reviews.author: H.A.H.

customer_reviews.title: Great hair product that's worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this stuff for a few years now. It works great. Never lets me down.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Trebotich

customer_reviews.title: Fake product.
customer_reviews.text: Seems real but it’s a knock off. There are pebbles in this product. Do not buy. Go to Ulta to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon user

customer_reviews.title: somethings off
customer_reviews.text: product seems different than what I'm used to from the store. Its not horrible, but the store but container just seemed to have a better hold.
customer_reviews.author: kyle howard

customer_reviews.title: my boyfriend's holy grail product for his hair. he ...
customer_reviews.text: my boyfriend's holy grail product for his hair. he constantly gets compliments on how his hair looks so maybe this is the reason.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: natural look
customer_reviews.text: best stuff I've found for smell, natural look, and lasts the whole day
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: I have fine hair that needs some volume and texture
customer_reviews.text: I have fine hair that needs some volume and texture. Used American Crew Fiber for years for a matte finish...loved it until I found this. Amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S.B.

customer_reviews.title: Holds great.
customer_reviews.text: Nice, not to stiff, not too soft. Great for my thinner hair.
customer_reviews.author: Sixto

customer_reviews.title: A Winner!
customer_reviews.text: The best paste I have ever used -- the right combination of holding power and matte shine. Shampoo twice or use a good clarifying shampoo every few days.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gann

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Been using this stuff for 6 years, great hold, but not too much
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I switched to this when I borrowed my sons one day! I ordered right away! Love it !
customer_reviews.author: Mike from Louisiana

customer_reviews.title: Little pieces end up separating and breaking off into your hair like little pieces of dandruff
customer_reviews.text: Product too thick and clumpy. Little pieces end up separating and breaking off into your hair like little pieces of dandruff. Maybe it was a bit too dry? But product arrived sealed.
customer_reviews.author: Fuzzle muffins

customer_reviews.title: ... hair up quite well and the product is very nicely priced for the quality and the amount you get
customer_reviews.text: Holds my hair up quite well and the product is very nicely priced for the quality and the amount you get. My only problem is how the clay can sometimes remain visible and it being hard to blend in. Also, if you tend to sweat a lot, I'd suggest you to look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It’s okay. I prefer the reformer a lot more. They call it clay and that is what it feels like. It is too stiff and sticky. It’s hard to run a comb through.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Z

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: awesome product. I've been ordering this product for years now. its not shiny its not sticky just perfect!
customer_reviews.author: bastas

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my edges it will give u a matte finish and keep ur edges in place for days. It turns white but as long as you keep brushing it it will be fine
customer_reviews.author: deedee48

customer_reviews.title: Just as seen, very good!
customer_reviews.text: Great and leaves nice smell, but stiff but very good if you like that.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas C.

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Will only hold for longer hair when you combine with spritz. Otherwise, I prefer the texture of this compared to Crew Fiber.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Shin

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Husband has super curly hair and loves this. Works on the most humid days!
customer_reviews.author: SaraDLutz

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: We've tried a ton of hair products from expensive to cheap and this one actually works very well!
customer_reviews.author: S. Goldberg

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great product for your hair, applies easy and keeps looking fresh all day. One thing I would say... for the best results/look apply on fresh washed and dried hair
customer_reviews.author: Corneliu

customer_reviews.title: Controls difficult hair
customer_reviews.text: Comb it before it dries or it will flake. I have hard to control hair and this helps my curly poofy hair stay in place and look presentable. Super happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t allow for styling.
customer_reviews.text: This product pretty much dries a second after it touches your hands. There is no way to spread it through your hair. Wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Gallegos

customer_reviews.title: Matterial
customer_reviews.text: This product works really well in my hair, one of the few products that give me a strong hold all day long
customer_reviews.author: Superman_barker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Amazing price compared to local retail saves $10 and works just the same
customer_reviews.author: Bryson George

customer_reviews.title: This is my all time favorite edge control product
customer_reviews.text: This is my all time favorite edge control product... The first time my hair dresser used it I fell in love.... It's not water based and doesn't have that Gel sticky feel to it... I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Smells terrible
customer_reviews.text: Smells way too strong for a hair product. Bait n switch from the reformer, i wanted. Amazon sucks sometimes
customer_reviews.author: D E

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It gives hold but still lets your hair be soft to the touch and not crunchy.
customer_reviews.author: H. Bichsel

customer_reviews.title: Overall pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Strong material, washes off with water, nice look. Only con is and dries quickly and once it dries if you have some on your hands still it will pull your hair which can hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Leroux

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! A little goes a long way. Way better than other hair gels I've used.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect hold for hair and easy to mold, never leaves a mess and doesn't need a lot to use!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Lee

customer_reviews.title: It's great.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for a long time. A little goes a long way. It's great.
customer_reviews.author: George H Gardenier

customer_reviews.title: Reformer is better
customer_reviews.text: A lot harder to apply than my go-to reformer. Wish I could return it
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Apply to wet/damp hair then use a hair dryer on medium setting.
customer_reviews.text: Can’t even tell you have product In yours hair. Really strong hold.
customer_reviews.author: brandon

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect product. Product listed as Matterial but is actual ...
customer_reviews.text: Incorrect product. Product listed as Matterial but is actual Reformer.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: I think I like the reformer product but that means I’m leaving review ...
customer_reviews.text: Lol I ordered material and something else came: Reformer. I think I like the reformer product but that means I’m leaving review for the different product.
customer_reviews.author: Tae Hwan Kim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, doesn't take much to go a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have impossibly unmanageable hair. This is the only non-gel product that holds my hair in place.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Steger

customer_reviews.title: Amazon keeps deleting review
customer_reviews.text: It’s appears to be fake and will make your hair look like you have dandruff.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: disappointed for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Not the same as what i tried at my barbers ads no hold hair goes flat in minutes this product dries while in you hand like glue even if you can get it in your hair it offers no hold.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a guy in my early twenties who is experiencing hair loss. Fortunately, this product is a firm holding, thickening paste. I've been using it for about 9 months and I absolutely love it. Makes my hair look thicker and it doesn't look gunky or greasy in my hair!
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey

customer_reviews.title: I like Mitch reformer better
customer_reviews.text: Nice but Mitch reformer works better on my hair. This leaves my hair a tiny bit greasy for some reason. But it nice stuff if you need some texture. I have fine blond hair though.
customer_reviews.author: ts twain

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: I have bought multiple varieties of various hair products for my teenage son and finally got one that he likes! He has full, thick, straight hair that is longer on the top and likes to have a product that will hold his style in place throughout the day without being stiff and untouchable. This seems to be the first of many that he has tried that does exactly that. He is already asking for more, because his friends like it too.
customer_reviews.author: jaylon

customer_reviews.title: Firm hold, fresh smell and reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: This clay is a solid option for those with thick hair. I have thick and slightly wavy hair which can be hard to manage at times, but this clay does it well and it does it all day. What's nice about it, is it is very easy to rub into my hair a few minutes after my shower, and it won't mess up even when putting on shirts. It smells nice, not overpowering, and not dirty like some clay products. The price is reasonable considering it lasts a few months before managing to get through the whole container.
customer_reviews.author: D. MiyaoTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Settles frizzy hair
customer_reviews.text: A small amount of this works so well to bring in stray, wispy hairs. If you already use this, but another fresh one. They can dry out over time.
customer_reviews.author: David R.

customer_reviews.title: Great hold
customer_reviews.text: Great hold without looking like you're wearing a lot of hair product. My husband loves it.
customer_reviews.author: RedHairWithaCurl

customer_reviews.title: Good, but...
customer_reviews.text: Let me begin by saying that I really like Mitch products. I leave my hair a little longer on the top so that I can style it a little, and I like the firm hold that Mitch products have. However, this one might have crossed the line. It holds so firm that it feels like I'm ripping my hair out as I apply. It definitely keeps its hold and it does wash out very easily, but I think Mitch Reformer is a superior product that will give you similar hold.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, feels good
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great for styling short hair. However, it does not work as well on longer hair, so be sure you're using the correct product for your desired hairstyle.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 15 year old likes this but I can't say it HOLD very well..... or not at ALL?
customer_reviews.author: Kimmie Green

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I've used several brands and this has got to be the worst so far. It was very sticky and smeared on my hair, not allowing the matte finish, as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Nate Miller

customer_reviews.title: It feels like glue with I put it in my hair
customer_reviews.text: Not fan of matterial at all. It feels like glue with I put it in my hair. Can't seem to get it to spread evenly throughout my hair. Just clumps up wherever I apply it first. Reformer is a much better option. For me at least
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy product is not good it it hurts when you put it in your hair
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: I wasted my money
customer_reviews.text: The photo of the product and the description are not the same. I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Garett Workmon

customer_reviews.title: I thought I ordered Reformer when I purchased this what ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought I ordered Reformer when I purchased this what was sent and didn't want to go through the hassle of returning it. The hold on this is just way too strong and does not leave your hair with a visual unappealing texture.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Tubbs

customer_reviews.title: Great scent
customer_reviews.text: Holds hair very well but still can run your hands through it unlike hairspray. Actually really bought it because the Barber put it in my hair and the wife loved the scent and asked me to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: BBertsch

product_meta.title: MITCH Matterial Styling Hair Clay
product_meta.description:
Specially formulated for men, MITCH Matterial contains thickening ingredients to bulk up fine hair and strong fixatives to lock hairstyles in place. This matte clay hair product contains natural clay to eliminate shine, leaving a dry, ultra-matte finish. Great for creating modern, textured hairstyles.

BRAND STORY
MITCH is premier men’s hair care from John Paul Mitchell Systems—the leader of salon-quality products committed to the professional beauty industry. Every purchase supports JPMS salons with a commission.
